Individual mandate to buy health insuran: Everyone in Massachusetts must purchase health insurance or pay a penalty.
Employer responsibilities for offering h: Companies with more than 10 employees must offer health insurance or pay a penalty.
Health insurance exchanges: The plan involves the use of voluntary "exchanges" through which individuals and small businesses may purchase private-sector health insurance.
Affordability subsidies: Lower-income individuals and families receive government subsidies to help pay their health insurance premiums. Subsidies are allotted on a sliding scale up to 300 percent of the federal poverty level.
